Description: RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES:• Patrol across the trains inside the determined zone.• Deal with the customers in a friendly way.• Control any violations identified inside the trains.• Report any grave offenses to the supervisor.• Follow supervisor instructions and guidance.• Achieve all additional missions related to work assigned by the superiors. ESSENTIAL QUALIFICATIONS, KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCEQUALIFICATIONS:• Suitable University DegreeKNOWLEDGE:• Basic understanding of Facilities Management, Control & SecurityEXPERIENCE:• Min. 2 years of experience in a Control & Security Service is preferable DESIRED BEHAVIORS• Ability to handle stress and critical situations.• Ability to work as a part of a team.• Ability to Work under pressure.• Ability to attention to details.Job Details
